Latest News: Authorities in Kiribati and Samoa impose lockdowns because of COVID-19 (ABC, 22.02.2022).

International Restrictions:
*Entry rules in response to coronavirus (COVID-19): Kiribati re-opened its borders on 1 August 2022. For the latest information on COVID-19 protocols for entry to Kiribati, see announcements on the Governmentâ€™s social media posts on Facebook

Internal Restrictions:
Travel in Kiribati: If you test positive for COVID-19, you may need to stay where you are until you test negative. You may also need to seek treatment there.
